title: My Uncle Napoleon - Daei Jan Napoleon (1976-1977)

sources.title: MyUncleNapoleon DaeiJanNapoleon1976
sources.description: Synopsis A masterpiece movie based on Iraj Pezeshkzad's novel "My dear Uncle Napoleon". An uproarious adoption of a popular novel by Iraj Pezeshkzad set in and around the family compound in early 1940s Tehran, marvelously rich in personality and incident. The title character, so-called because of his constant invocation of the general, rules over a wonderfully complex extended family. A hilarious series which makes fun of just about everything. Cast: Esmail Davarfar .... Doost-Ali Parviz Fanizadeh .... Mash Ghasem Jahangir Forouhar .... Nayeb Teymour Saeed Kangarani .... Saeed Nosratallah Karimi .... Agha Jan Mohamad Ali Keshavarz .... Sarhang Parvin Malakuti .... Azizalsaltaneh Sussan Moghadam .... Leili Gholamhossein Naghshineh .... Daii Jan Parviz Sayyad .... Asdallah Mirza Parvin Soleimani .... Cadet Officer Ghiaasabadi's Mother Mohammad Varshochi .... Cadet Officer Ghiaasabadi Kheirollah Tafreshi Azad .... Shamsali Mirza Bahman Zarrinpour .... Puri Zari Zandipour .... Qamar Mir Ahmad Irvanloo .... Dr. Naser al-Hokama Mastaneh Jazayeri .... Akhtar Fereydoun Nariman .... Asghar the Diesel Karmen Zaki .... Farokh Laqa Mahmood Lotfi .... Shir Ali the Butcher Minoo Abrishami .... Tahereh Gril Singh .... Sarda Maharat Khan Produced by: Naser Taghvai Cinematography by: Ali Reza Zarrindast Costume Design by: Eskandar Radfar Makeup Department: Abdollah Eskandari Location(s): Lalezar, Tehran Running time: 45 minutes
